featured.text: With a continuous 3 km stretch of golden sand, the beach attracts artists around the world each summer to create amazing _____ with its fine soft sand.
Girls were __(28)__ more sensitive to sounds and more skillful at fine motor performance than boys.
Extra virgin oil, the finest grade, is made from the first pressing of the olives and has a very low acidity rate (under 1%).
We’re very close and I’m sure we’ll do just fine.” 41.

other.text: 30 , baseball fans are more content to concentrate on the game’s finer details and spend the breaks between innings filling out their own private scorecards.
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Willig was fined $250,000.
Instead, he would be fined a penny for each of the 110 floors he had climbed.
Isn’t it supposed to be a healthy choice? (F) Linda I liked it fine.

definition.en_def: Of high quality; thin or delicate.
definition.example: She wore a fine dress to the party.
